name: Offworld Pilot
description:
Offworld Pilot lets you experience the diverse and increasingly challenging life of one the last space pilots daring to compete against fully automated vessels.

After a terrible accident with an AI-controlled transporter you get the chance to fly missions that were previously thought to be impossible for the human mind. Are you up for the challenge?

This projectis in development. I am releasing the first level in the hope of improving the game with your feedback. Thanks!

www.offworldpilot.com
